attributes.action: Amend the restrictions on the Disabled Persons Travel Pass
attributes.additional_details:
The fact you cannot use the travel pass before 9:30am is a problem for many people all over the United Kingdom.
Not being able to use the pass before 9:30am can prevent people from travelling to work, college, school, meetings etc. People whom have a disabled buss pass have so for a reason, the reason being they are disabled and in some way struggle or are not able to carry out every day activities to the ability that everyone else is able to.
attributes.background: We want the government/parliament to lift the time restrictions on the Disabled Persons Travel pass

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Enable disabled bus pass users to travel during peak times across England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701163
